item.title: 10 Ways The Monkey Changes Stephen King's Horror Book
item.description: Osgood Perkins' The Monkey makes some very deliberate changes to the original Stephen King short story, which turns the plot into a comedy.

item.title: The Monkey's Toy Explained: The Origin, Powers & How It Compares To The Book
item.description: The killer toy in Osgood Perkins's The Monkey is a mysterious and powerful force like in Stephen King's short story, albeit with some differences.

item.title: The Monkey's Ending Explained: What Happens To The Toy & What It Sets Up
item.description: The Monkey has a pretty gruesome ending. We break down the film's ending, what it means for a potential sequel & what's changed from the short story.
